Texts.Chs: 野餐长凳。也许我可以在这里吃。。。？
Texts.Eng: A picnic bench. Maybe I could eat out here...?

Texts.Chs: 野餐桌！我当然可以在这里坐一会儿。
Texts.Eng: A picnic table! I could certainly sit here for a while.

Texts.Chs: 户外野餐听起来很不错。
Texts.Eng: An outdoor picnic sounds just lovely.

Texts.Chs: 在大自然中吃东西？多么浪漫的想法！
Texts.Eng: Eating outside amongst nature? What a romantic idea!

Texts.Chs: 叶族人以前曾为野餐争吵过。
Texts.Eng: Floran has fought with antss over picnics before.

Texts.Chs: 坐下来之前要小心那些红蚂蚁——它们是活泼的小东西！。
Texts.Eng: Gotta watch out for those red ants before sitting down - they're feisty little things!.
Sitting out here would be rather calming.
